original_text:
I would give him an account of my every step;
    I would present it to him as to a ruler.)—
korean_text: 내 걸음의 수효를 그에게 알리고 왕족처럼 그를 가까이 하였으리라

sentences.original_text: I would give him an account
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그에게 설명을 해 줄 것이다

sentences.original_text: I would present it to him
